snippet: ROSATI--Michael. Michael William Rosati passed away April 9 at home, surrounded by his loving family - Kitty, his wife of 34 years, and his daughters Katy, Lily and Margaret. Son of the late Dr. Louis Michael and Ann Dorothy Rosati, he was born June 1, 1943 in White Sulphur Springs, WV. He grew up in New York City and attended Phillips Andover ('61) and Yale ('65) before receiving his J.D. at Cornell ('68) and LL.M. from New York University ('69). Requiescat in pace. 1/3
lead_paragraph: ROSATI--Michael. Michael William Rosati passed away April 9 at home, surrounded by his loving family - Kitty, his wife of 34 years, and his daughters Katy, Lily and Margaret. Son of the late Dr. Louis Michael and Ann Dorothy Rosati, he was born June 1, 1943 in White Sulphur Springs, WV. He grew up in New York City and attended Phillips Andover ('61) and Yale ('65) before receiving his J.D. at Cornell ('68) and LL.M. from New York University ('69). Requiescat in pace. 1/3
